name: Modern Sniper Killer 3D
description:
Take aim at the right time and shoot the enemy! Modern Sniper KIller 3D is one of the best shooting game that will give you the chance to increase your shooting skills.Modern Sniper KIller 3D takes you on a twisted tour to the underworld crime. Get ready to part in dangerous attacking missions.Go and get the accurate headshots now!
Enjoy the game with 3D graphics, marvelous and fluid controls.
